column1: Kata Robata////I use to work literally down the street from this place.  So when it first opened
column2: we would go about once a week for lunch.  We always got the bento boxes (so much food).  It came with beef rib eye (a bit chewy sometimes)
column5: or sashimi.  The box included a california roll or rice
column13: always a surprise).  And you get your choice of miso soup or salad...I think they say miso soup cost extra
